name: Legacy ePlayer
author: brianmiyaji

sections.description:
Legacy ePlayer

Notice: The streaming service is no longer available, so this plugin will not be able to stream any videos.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 3.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater
sections.changelog:
0.9.9

  • Deprecate – The streaming service is no longer available, so this plugin will not be able to stream any videos.

0.9.8

  • Tweak – Add SportsPress to recommended plugins.
  • Localization – Update French, Tamil, Persian, and Turkish translations.

0.9.7

  • Feature – New Premier League channels for Bournemouth and Watford.
  • Localization – Update Spanish, Norwegian, German, Armenian, Portuguese, and Italian translations.

0.9.6

  • Feature – 47 new channels added for Japan.
  • Feature – 35 new channels added for Portugal.
  • Localization – Update Finnish translation.

0.9.5

  • Fix – Video players always appearing at the top of posts instead of actual location.

0.9.4

  • Localization – Update French, Polish, Czech, Kannada, Russian, Italian, German, Finnish, and Korean translations.

0.9.3

  • Localization – Update Polish, French, Czech, Dutch, Kannada, Finnish, Swedish, German, and Russian translations.

0.9.2

  • Tweak – Add icon to admin widget.
  • Localization – Add 42 Spanish channels.

0.9.1

  • Fix – Switching regions causing channel dropdown to become inactive in some cases.

0.9

  • Beta release.

description:

Notice: The streaming service is no longer available, so this plugin will not be able to stream any videos.
